compensation.title: Apply for Disaster Compensation
compensation.subtitle: Government Relief Program for Emergency Disaster (Gazette No. 2464/30 dated 28-11-2025)
compensation.description: Apply for government compensation for damages caused by the recent disaster. Select all applicable claims based on your situation.

personalInfo.title: Applicant Information
personalInfo.fullNamePlaceholder: Enter your full name as per NIC
personalInfo.addressHint: Provide detailed address including street, area, and landmarks

locationInfo.title: Location Information
locationInfo.description: Select your administrative location to help us process your application

claimsSelection.title: Select Your Claims
claimsSelection.description: Check all compensation types you are eligible for based on damages you suffered
claimsSelection.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one claim type

CLEANING_ALLOWANCE.title: Cleaning & Resettlement Allowance
CLEANING_ALLOWANCE.description: One-time payment for cleaning and safely resettling in your house

KITCHEN_UTENSILS.title: Kitchen Utensils Allowance
KITCHEN_UTENSILS.description: One-time payment to purchase essential kitchen items

LIVELIHOOD_ALLOWANCE.title: Livelihood Allowance
LIVELIHOOD_ALLOWANCE.description: Monthly allowance for 3 months (Dec 2025 - Feb 2026) for families unable to continue livelihoods
LIVELIHOOD_ALLOWANCE.amount: Rs. 25,000 (2 or fewer members) / Rs. 50,000 (more than 2 members)

RENTAL_ALLOWANCE.title: Rental Allowance
RENTAL_ALLOWANCE.description: Monthly rental allowance for house owners who lost their houses

CROP_DAMAGE_PADDY.title: Crop Damage - Paddy/Grains/Maize
CROP_DAMAGE_PADDY.description: Allowance for crop damages or replanting of paddy, grains, maize, and field crops

CROP_DAMAGE_VEGETABLES.title: Crop Damage - Vegetables
CROP_DAMAGE_VEGETABLES.description: Allowance for crop damages or replanting of vegetable cultivations

LIVESTOCK_FARM.title: Livestock Farm Damage
LIVESTOCK_FARM.description: Allowance for livestock farms (only for registered farm owners)

SMALL_ENTERPRISE.title: Small & Micro Enterprises
SMALL_ENTERPRISE.description: Allowance to bring enterprises to a condition suitable for recommencing operations

FISHING_BOAT.title: Fishing Boat Damage
FISHING_BOAT.description: Damage compensation for disaster-affected fishing boats

SCHOOL_SUPPLIES.title: School Supplies
SCHOOL_SUPPLIES.description: Allowance for affected school children to purchase books and clothing

BUSINESS_BUILDING.title: Business Building Damage
BUSINESS_BUILDING.description: Compensation for damaged business buildings (based on damage assessment)

NEW_HOUSE_CONSTRUCTION.title: New House Construction
NEW_HOUSE_CONSTRUCTION.description: Allowance to build a new house for completely damaged and uninhabitable houses

LAND_PURCHASE.title: Land Purchase
LAND_PURCHASE.description: Allowance to purchase suitable land to build a new house when government land cannot be provided

HOUSE_REPAIR.title: House Repair
HOUSE_REPAIR.description: Allowance to repair partially damaged houses (based on damage assessment)

DEATH_DISABILITY.title: Death or Disability
DEATH_DISABILITY.description: Compensation to the closest relative of a person who died or became completely disabled
